column5: We would like to wish everyone on OFC a very Merry Fishmas and a Fishful 2011.  OFC was the first place to display our Toons a year ago this month.  Thank you to TJ and the rest of the mod squad for helping us get to where we are today and to those OFNers who have shown their support.  Stay tooned, there is lots planned for 2011. We wish everyone a fun, safe holiday season.  All the best,  Phil (Harrison) and Maureen (Lake Ranger) Creators - Off the Dock Toons  December Toon as featured in this months OFC Emag
GREAT TOON !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Merry Christmas to you also. Thanks for bringing us the gift of humor all year long !!!  Paul
Merry Christmas to you two as well...  Thanks for the laughs and the talent you share
Merry Fishmas right back at you Richard
Merry Christmas!  All the best to Off the Dock Toons in the new year!
Hey Phil,to you and Maureen an the family.All the best bud.
Merry Christmas guys hope 2011 is a great year for Off the Dock toons

Phil, Merry Christmas to you and Maureen and to your families as well. Thank you for giving me another life in your caricatures. Also, thank you for the trade make empty in every frame. Love reading fishing stuff but when the OFC magazine comes out every month, Off the Dock is the first thing I look at. Thank you again and be well.  Regards, Roy the perch.
